title: Are Azir's minions able to attack a champ under turret
body: I didn't think he was able to, i was almost sure they couldn't but every time I play against him I see it. Its pretty broken in my mind.

replies.body: Azir is fking broken except he is squishy as velkoz

Its not as broken as you think, the soldiers last such a short amount of time under the turret, they do less damage than ziggs' Q, Xerath's Q or TF's Q which are easier to poke under the turret and unlike those 3 champs his poke takes 2 abilities and combined more mana too.

plus its wasteful to try poking as him under the turret, his W is much more cost effective to use on the turret itself, and unless he can get a kill or assist, thats what he should be doing.

the best thing you can do is play Azir for a day or two and get the hang of how Azir players think.

Source: im an Azir main
they really shouldnt attack when that fear thing is on them....
yes he can but the soldiers don't last very long when in tower range
